abstract: Ice hockey’s international governing body, IIHF, fines Russian Hockey Federation $85,000 for its national team leaving ice before Canadian national anthem played at Canada’s world championship final celebration in May 2015.
lead_paragraph: Signaled by their captain, the Russians left the ice before the Canadian national anthem after Canada won the world championship final in May.

headline.main: Russian Hockey Federation Fined for Snub of Canada

snippet: Signaled by their captain, the Russians left the ice before the Canadian national anthem after Canada won the world championship final in May.
